root.name: Park Patrol
root.description: OverviewPark Patrol is a Commodore 64 game that was developed by Activision and was released in 1984. It was later released on the ZX Spectrum and Amstrad CPC platforms.You take on the role of a park ranger, and are tasked with the removal of rubbish and debris from the shoreline, as well as being required to rescue drowning swimmers for additional points. Enemies such as snakes and turtles impede the progress of your yacht across the lake. The game features five different levels to complete.
